incidents.name: Cloudflare services functioning normally in Spain, Portugal, Andorra, and France

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
We have routed some traffic out of this region to ensure our services continue to function normally. We will continue to monitor this situation and will provide further updates as it develops.

Cloudflare is aware of the widespread power issues in Spain, Portugal, Andorra, and France. All Cloudflare services are online and functioning normally in the region.  We will continue to monitor the situation and take appropriate action.

incidents.name: Single File Purge Delays on China Network

incident_updates.body: This incident is now resolved.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - CDN Cache Purge

incident_updates.body: We have identified the issue and applied a fix. We are currently monitoring the results.

affected_components.name: Cloudflare Sites and Services - CDN Cache Purge

incident_updates.body: Cloudflare single-file cache purging (purge by URL) called via the Dashboard/API is running up to 60 minutes behind only on the China Network. We are working to resolve this issue as soon as possible. Until then you may use a different purge feature but do be aware it may cause additional traffic to your origin server(s). More updates to follow.

incidents.name: Cloudflare: "Under Attack" mode experiencing issues

incident_updates.body: This incident has been resolved.
A fix has been implemented and we are monitoring the results.
We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.
The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

Cloudflare is aware of, and investigating an issue in which our zones on a Free plan level are not able to use the "Under Attack" mode.
Further detail will be provided as more information becomes available.
